ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringEvaluatio.description: Represents the generic evaluation result summary.

projectKind.description: Represents the project type that the evaluation ran on.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringSummariza.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom conversation summarization project.

summarizationEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to conversation summarization evaluation.

values.description: A project to build natural language into apps, bots, and IoT devices.
A project to connect and orchestrate Conversation, Custom question answering and LUIS projects together in one single project.
A project to build custom conversation summarization model.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringSummariza.description: Represents the exported assets of a conversation summarization project.

conversations.description: The list of conversations belonging to the project.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringSummariza.description: Represents an exported data item for a custom abstractive summarization project.

conversationLocation.description: The location of the input conversation to be summarized. The blob content format is JSON of Conversation object.
